question: How do I access the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Agent re-certification training for Plan Year 2025?
text:
How do I access the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Agent re-certification training for Plan Year 2025?
          
        
If you are currently a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace-Certified Agent for PY2024, you will be required to complete a modified recertification curriculum. The training must be completed by October 31, 2024 for certification to be effective for November 1, 2024 for PY25. . The training can be found at:
http://www.marketplace.virginia.gov
. All agents who were certified in 2023 for PY24 will receive an email from no-reply@scc.virginia.gov when the PY2025 recertification program becomes available in late summer 2024. Agents will follow the instructions in that email to log in to their VIM LMS account and begin the recertification modules. Once complete, agents will need to sign an updated VAHBE - Agent Agreement and attach the signed agreement to their VIM LMS account.
